Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
src.controller.StudentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuthController, IReportGenerator
public class StudentController extends Object implements AuthController, IReportGenerator
Controller used by students to search internships, manage applications, and accept/withdraw from offers.

Responsibilities include account authentication, browsing opportunities, applying for internships, accepting offers, withdrawing from applications, and generating reports.

    Constructs the controller and acquires the shared `DataStore` instance.

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentStudent

      public void setCurrentStudent(Student s)
      Sets the currently authenticated student for this controller.
      Parameters:
      s - the `Student` to set as current

    • getCurrentStudent

      public Student getCurrentStudent()
      Returns the currently authenticated student.
      Returns:
      the current `Student`, or null if none authenticated

    • login

      public LoginResult login(String userName, String pw)
      Attempts to authenticate a student user.
      Specified by:
      login in interface AuthController
      Parameters:
      userName - student user id
      pw - plaintext password to verify
      Returns:
      a `LoginResult` indicating success or the type of failure

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the currently authenticated student by clearing the current student reference.
      Specified by:
      logout in interface AuthController

    • updatePassword

      public boolean updatePassword(String oldPW, String newPW)
      Updates the password for the currently authenticated student.
      Specified by:
      updatePassword in interface AuthController
      Parameters:
      oldPW - existing password for verification
      newPW - new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated, false otherwise

    • getInternshipsOpportunities

      public ArrayList<Internship> getInternshipsOpportunities()
      Returns a list of internship opportunities available to the current student.

      Filtering criteria include visibility, approval status, availability, major compatibility, and internship level (basic level required for first/second year students).

      Returns:
      list of applicable `Internship` objects

    • applyForInternship

      public boolean applyForInternship(Internship internship)
      Submits an application for the given internship on behalf of the current student.

      Validation checks include: student not already accepted for another internship, student has fewer than 3 pending applications, student hasn't already applied to this internship, and major compatibility.

      Parameters:
      internship - the `Internship` to apply for
      Returns:
      true if application was created and added, false if any validation fails

    • getMyApplications

      public ArrayList<InternshipApplication> getMyApplications()
      Returns all pending internship applications submitted by the current student.
      Returns:
      list of `InternshipApplication` objects for the current student

    • acceptInternshipOffer

      public boolean acceptInternshipOffer(InternshipApplication application)
      Accepts an internship offer by confirming the company's approval and setting the internship as accepted for the current student.

      This action withdraws all other pending applications and adds the student to the internship's applicant list.

      Parameters:
      application - the `InternshipApplication` offer to accept
      Returns:
      true if the offer was accepted, false if validation fails

    • wtihdraw

      public boolean wtihdraw(InternshipApplication application)
      Submits a withdrawal request for the given internship application.
      Parameters:
      application - the `InternshipApplication` for which to request withdrawal
      Returns:
      true after marking the withdrawal as pending

    • generateReport

      public List<Internship> generateReport(ReportCriteria criteria)
      Generates a report of internships according to the provided criteria.
      Specified by:
      generateReport in interface IReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      criteria - the `ReportCriteria` used to filter and sort internships
      Returns:
      list of internships matching the criteria

    • printReport

      public void printReport(List<Internship> internships)
      Prints a textual report to standard output for the provided internships.
      Parameters:
      internships - list of internships to print
